trans-unit.source: Represents a security token that is based upon a Kerberos ticket that is received in a SOAP message.
Typically, application developers do not need to use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosReceiverSecurityToken> class.

There are two classes that represent security tokens that are based upon a Kerberos ticket: <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken> and <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosReceiverSecurityToken>.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken> security token is used by clients that use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken> security token in outgoing SOAP messages, whereas the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosReceiverSecurityToken> security token is used by a Web service that receives SOAP messages that contain the security token.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosReceiverSecurityToken"></xref> class using the specified Kerberos ticket.
For the `request` parameter, pass the Kerberos ticket that is the returned from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken.GetRequest%2A> method.
This constructor generates a unique identifier of the security token and sets that value to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken.Id%2A> property.
An array of <xref href="System.Byte"></xref> that contains a Kerberos ticket.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosReceiverSecurityToken"></xref> class using the specified Kerberos ticket and unique identifier.
An array of <xref href="System.Byte"></xref> that contains the Kerberos ticket.
A unique identifier of the security token.
Sets the value of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosRequestorSecurityToken.Id"></xref> property.
Creates a new instance of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosReceiverSecurityToken"></xref>.
An array of bytes that contains the Kerberos ticket.
A unique identifier for the security token.
The URI that describes the value type.
Gets a value that indicates whether this security token is capable of creating the specified key identifier.
To create the key identifier clause, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosReceiverSecurityToken.CreateKeyIdentifierClause%2A> method.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> that specifies the type of key identifier to create.
`true` when T is of type ; otherwise, `false`.
Creates the specified key identifier clause.

To determine whether the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosReceiverSecurityToken> class can create the specified key identifier clause, call the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosReceiverSecurityToken.CanCreateKeyIdentifierClause%2A> method.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> that specifies the type of key identifier to create.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> that is a key identifier clause for the security token.
Gets the Kerberos ticket.
The Kerberos ticket is specified in the constructor.
An array of <xref href="System.Byte"></xref> that contains the Kerberos ticket.
Returns a value that indicates whether the key identifier for this instance matches the specified key identifier.
`true` if skiClause is of type and the Kerberos ticket match; otherwise, `false`.
Gets the symmetric session key for the Kerberos ticket that is associated with this security token.
The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosReceiverSecurityToken.SecurityKey%2A> property is set when the Kerberos ticket is authenticated.
A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SymmetricSecurityKey"></xref> that contains the symmetric session key for the Kerberos ticket that is associated with this security token.
Gets the cryptographic keys associated with the security token.

The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosReceiverSecurityToken.SecurityKeys%2A> property contains the symmetric session key in the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.KerberosReceiverSecurityToken.SecurityKey%2A> property.

A <xref href="System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1"></xref> of type <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey"></xref> that contains the set of keys associated with the security token.
Gets the first instant in time at which this security token is valid.
A <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> that represents the instant in time at which this security token is first valid.
Gets the last instant in time at which this security token is valid.
A <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> that represents the last instant in time at which this security token is valid.
Gets the URI that describes the value type.
Returns <xref href="System.String"></xref>.
Gets the Windows user associated with this security token.
A <xref href="System.Security.Principal.WindowsIdentity"></xref> that represents a Windows user.
